title: Building Reliable Applications with Google's Gemini 2.0 Flash
title1: How Developers can Build Reliable Applications with Gemini 2.0 Flash
title2: How Developers can Build Reliable Applications with Gemini 2.0 Flash
description: Google has released Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking, a direct competitor to OpenAI's o1 and a breakthrough in AI models with transparent reasoning. Compare features, benchmarks, and limitations.
author: Lina Lam
